title: SlideJS Integration Demo
description: Learn how to integrate slide presentation libraries with WSXJS components for creating interactive presentations. This demo showcases the integration of @slidejs/runner-swiper and @slidejs/runner-splide with WSX components, demonstrating DSL-based slide creation and theme management.

demo.title: Interactive Slide Demo
demo.description: Switch between Swiper and Splide players, and toggle between dark and light themes. Use keyboard arrows to navigate slides.

basic.title: Basic Integration
basic.description: Import SlideJS runners and initialize them in component lifecycle hooks. Use DSL (Domain Specific Language) to define slides.

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Leverage WSX component lifecycle hooks for slide initialization and cleanup. Use reactive state for theme switching and player selection.

benefit1.title: DSL-Based Slide Creation
benefit1.description: Define slides using a simple DSL syntax. Support for multiple runners (Swiper, Splide) with the same DSL source.

benefit2.title: Component Lifecycle Integration
benefit2.description: Leverage WSX component lifecycle hooks (onConnected, onDisconnected) for proper slide runner initialization and cleanup.

benefit3.title: Reactive Theme & Player Management
benefit3.description: Use @state decorator for automatic UI updates when switching themes or players. Full TypeScript support ensures type safety.
